title: Spread Joy this Season to those in need with "The Merrie Christmas Project."
itunes:title: Spread Joy this Season to those in need with "The Merrie Christmas Project."
description:
Merrie Kaplan loved Christmas. Born with a rare genetic conditions, Williams Syndrome, Merrie was known as a friendly, outgoing woman, who brought joy to all. Now, her memory has given birth to an effort to extend that joy to families throughout Central Georgia’s 14-county area. ‘The MERRIE Christmas Project,’ aims to provide gifts, holiday décor, and food to families in need during the Christmas season. 


Joining Nancy Grace today:


Mike and Nancy Kaplan, Merrie's parents

Jamie Kaplan, Director of Philanthropy, United Way of Central Georgia

George McCanless, President and CEO, United Way of Central Georgia


United Way of Central Georgia is accepting donations for ‘The MERRIE Christmas Project’ here.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
